title: Which NITs are going to increase seat intake for this session 2020-2021? How will it affect the cutoff? - Quora

response.answer_text: If the seat will increase as there is no any official announcement till today. It will be for GEN EWS quota so it will definitely help the students belonging to this quota as well as the the students coming from gen quota. Because EWS category student will prefer to take advantage of their category rank it will help gen category stu to get good NIT at lower rank than what it was in the previous year.

JoSAA releases the official seat matrix before the commencement of the counselling process with all details such as seats reserved under various categories, seats under each branch of each college. Once it comes, you’ll get an idea. The glitch this time is the EWS quota so can’t make any predictions.
